title: Beyonce's mom, Tina Knowles, wishes her a happy 38th birthday on Instagram
text:
In honor of Beyonce's 38th birthday, her mother, Tina Knowles, shared a loving tribute about her daughter's tremendous influence and their unbreakable bond.

"38 years ago today you came into my life and i know without a shred of doubt that God sent you!!!" she began her post on Instagram about her older daughter.

"I had recently lost my mom and never thought that i could feel that particular kind of love again but 7 months later i was pregnant with you (39 years ago people) The moment i saw you i knew that that was IT !!!!" she continued.

She explained that the two have been "the best of friends since then."

"You have brought me such Joy and pride and love and friendship !!!" she wrote about Beyonce. "Your heart is as big as Texas !! You are one of the best moms ever ! And I love you soo much."

Her post comes after Beyonce shared some intimate snaps on Tuesday with her family celebrating her birthday.

In one video included in the post, the Grammy-award winning artist can be seen dancing and holding her cake, while her peers sing her "Happy Birthday."

Her husband, Jay-Z, was also featured in snaps included in the post.
description: In honor of Beyonce's big day, her mother, Tina Knowles, shared a loving tribute about her daughter's tremendous influence and their unbreakable bond.
